approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user must be able to input a text description for the task. The system should store this description.

requirements.title: View Task List Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.  The list should show the task descriptions.

requirements.title: Task Description Length Limit (Non-Functional)
requirements.description: The system shall limit the length of the task description to a reasonable character limit to prevent excessive storage usage and improve UI readability.

requirements.title: Task List Performance (Non-Functional)
requirements.description: The system shall display the list of tasks within a reasonable time frame to ensure a good user experience.

raw_analysis.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks
project_goals: Provide an efficient system for data management and organization
Deliver an intuitive user experience that meets user needs
Ensure optimal system performance and responsiveness
